Html:
Privet , Misha. I hope you have big plans for your charting piece, otherwise a lot of good souls are going to wind up dead in the watter.

I am using RingArray to show last 300 minutes of data. The last value is the current minute and it's changing constantly untill this minute is gone. Once it shows up on a chart , it never gets updated when that last value in RingArray is changed.

Hi,

 

Can you please upload somewhere code that can reproduce this case?
